query.statement: SELECT MAX(X.NAM) NAM, MAX(X.SPT) SPT, MAX(X.ADR) ADR, MAX(X.SPC) SPC, MAX(X.ETN) ETN, MAX(X.TXT1) TXT1, MAX(X.TXT2) TXT2, MAX(X.TXT3) TXT3, MAX(X.TXT4) TXT4, MAX(X.CNM) CNM, MAX(X.MPN) MPN, MAX(X.ACD) ACD, MAX(X.HNT) HNT, MAX(X.SNT) SNT, MAX(X.KND_NM) KND_NM, CASE WHEN MAX(X.KND) = 'B' THEN MAX(Z.CS309_ENM) ELSE MAX(X.KND_NM) END ENM, SUM(X.ENT) ENT, SUM(X.LNT) LNT, SUM(X.CNT) CNT, SUM(X.KNT) KNT, CASE WHEN MAX(X.KND) = 'B' THEN MAX(Z.CS309_PRC) ELSE MAX(Y.CS308_EXC) END PRC, MAX(Y.CS308_LPP) LPP, MAX(Y.CS308_CPP) CPP, MAX(Y.CS308_KEP) KEP, SUM(X.EMT) EMT, SUM(X.LMT) LMT, SUM(X.CMT) CMT, SUM(X.KMT) KMT, SUM(X.ZMT) ZMT, SUM(X.EMT) + SUM(X.LMT) + SUM(X.CMT) + SUM(X.KMT) + SUM(X.ZMT) SAM, MAX(Y.CS308_SMA) * MAX(X.HNT) + MAX(Y.CS308_SMB) SMC, MAX(Y.CS308_WAG) WAG, MAX(X.SMT) SMT, MAX(X.GMT) GMT, MAX(X.NMT) NMT, MAX(X.CCT) CCT, MAX(X.AMT) AMT, MAX(X.VAT) VAT, MAX(X.TOT) TOT FROM ( SELECT A.CS306_NAM NAM, A.CS306_SPT SPT, A.CS306_ADR ADR, A.CS306_SPC SPC, A.CS306_PJT PJT, 'Á¦' || A.CS306_TEM || '-' || A.CS306_RDT || '-' || A.CS306_SEQ || 'È£' ETN, D.DTEXT2 TXT1, D.DTEXT3 TXT2, D.DTEXT4 TXT3, D.CTEXT2 TXT4, E.USERNAME CNM, E.USERMBPN MPN, ( SELECT CASE WHEN VALUE(MAX(Z.VALUE),'') = 'EN81' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 Z WHERE Z.MANDT = B.MANDT AND Z.HOGI = B.CS307_PJT || B.CS307_HNO AND Z.CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_ACD2' ) ACD, A.CS306_HNT HNT, A.CS306_SNT SNT, A.CS306_KND KND, F.CTEXT2 KND_NM, ( SELECT MIN(INT(Y.CS309_FLR)) FROM SAPHEE.ZCST309 Y WHERE Y.MANDT = A.MANDT AND INT(Y.CS309_FLR) >= A.CS306_HNT ) FLR, B.CS307_ENT ENT, B.CS307_LNT LNT, B.CS307_CNT CNT, B.CS307_KNT KNT, B.CS307_EMT EMT, B.CS307_LMT LMT, B.CS307_CMT CMT, B.CS307_KMT KMT, B.CS307_ZMT ZMT, A.CS306_SMT SMT, A.CS306_GMT GMT, A.CS306_NMT NMT, A.CS306_CMT CCT, A.CS306_AMT AMT, A.CS306_VAT VAT, A.CS306_TOT TOT FROM SAPHEE.ZCST306 A, SAPHEE.ZCST307 B, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 C, SAPHEE.ZLCODE D, SAPHEE.ZUSERF E, SAPHEE.ZLCODE F WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS306_TEM = B.CS307_TEM AND A.CS306_RDT = B.CS307_RDT AND A.CS306_SEQ = B.CS307_SEQ AND A.CS306_SIR = B.CS307_SIR AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS306_BSU = C.LGORT AND C.LGORT > '' AND A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.CS306_TEM = D.CODE2 AND D.CODE1 = 'CS181' AND D.LANG = #G_LANG# AND A.MANDT = E.MANDT AND A.CS306_MID = E.USERNUMB AND A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.CS306_KND = F.CODE2 AND F.CODE1 = 'CS187' AND F.LANG = #G_LANG# AND A.CS306_TEM = SUBSTR(CAST(#ETN# AS VARCHAR(13)),1,3) AND A.CS306_RDT = SUBSTR(CAST(#ETN# AS VARCHAR(13)),5,4) AND A.CS306_SEQ = SUBSTR(CAST(#ETN# AS VARCHAR(13)),10,4) AND A.CS306_SIR = #SIR# ) X, SAPHEE.ZCST308 Y, SAPHEE.ZCST309 Z WHERE Y.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.KND = Y.CS308_KND AND Z.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.FLR = INT(Z.CS309_FLR) WITH UR
